meanings.definition: Coming after the sixteenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The seventeenth day of the month is my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She is the seventeenth person in line to enter the store.
meanings.sent3: The seventeenth cookie in the jar always mysteriously disappears.
meanings.sent4: The seventeenth wave crashed against the shore with a mighty roar.
meanings.sent5: The seventeenth chapter of the book revealed the surprising plot twist.

meanings.sent1: He ate a seventeenth of the pizza all by himself.
meanings.sent2: The cake was divided into seventeen equal seventeenths.
meanings.sent3: The seventeenth piece of the puzzle finally completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: In the game, each player had to collect their seventeenth token to win.
meanings.sent5: The seventeenth of the month was always a special day for the family reunion.
